response.original_title: Ron Geesin & l'Orchestre Philharmonique de Radio France Play Atom Heart Mother
response.overview: Video registration of a concert on January 12, 2012 in the Théâtre du Châtelet, Paris by Ron Geesin and the Orchestre Philharmonique de Radio France with vocal ensemble Les Métaboles, in which they perform Pink Floyd's Atom Heart Mother suite. Ron Geesin did the orchestration of the 1970 original version and a revision in 2008, which is featured here.
response.title: Ron Geesin & l'Orchestre Philharmonique de Radio France Play Atom Heart Mother
